sen.j: 小墾田猪手（おはりたのいて、生没年不明）は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: OHARITA no Ite (date of birth and death unknown) lived in the Asuka period in Japan.

sen.j: 天武天皇が挙兵を決めたとき、その子高市皇子と大津皇子は敵の本拠である大津を脱し、二手に分かれて父のあとを追った。
sen.e: When Prince Oama decided to raise an army, his children, the Prince Takechi and Otsu, escaped from Otsu where enemy's headquarters were located and ran after their father splitting in two groups.

sen.j: このうち大津皇子の一行は25日深夜に伊勢国の鈴鹿関に到達し、翌朝朝明郡の迹太川の辺で合流を果たした。
sen.e: Prince Otsu's party arrived at Suzuka-no-seki Checkpoint in Ise in the midnight of 25th and joined his father's party next morning around Toho-gawa River.
Prince Otsu's party arrived at the Suzuka-no-seki Checkpoint in Ise Province at midnight of 25th and joined his father's party next morning at the bank of Toho-gawa River in Asake-no-kori county.

sen.j: 小墾田猪手はこの一行の中にいた。
